snippet: Roger Federer rallied past Juan Martín del Potro, setting up a semifinal against Rafael Nadal at the ATP World Tour Finals in London.
abstract: Roger Federer rallies past Juan Martin del Potro, setting up a semifinal against Rafael Nadal at the ATP World Tour Finals in London.
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer rallied past Juan Martín del Potro, setting up a semifinal against Rafael Nadal at the ATP World Tour Finals in London.

headline.main: Federer Defeats Del Potro to Set Up Match With Nadal
